metadata.title: CVE-2022-28202 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: An XSS issue was discovered in MediaWiki before 1.35.6, 1.36.x before1.36.4, and 1.37.x before 1.37.2. The widthheight, widthheightpage, andnbytes properties of messages are not escaped when used in galleries orSpecial:RevisionDelete.

criterions.comment: mediawiki package in esm-apps/jammy is affected and may need fixing.
